synopsis.text: And so begins the transformative journey of Yatora Yaguchi, a high school student who, despite his academic prowess and social popularity, grapples with a profound sense of emptiness. His life takes an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon a captivating painting in his school's art room, sparking an unforeseen passion for art. As he delves deeper into this newfound world, Yatora finds himself consumed by a desire to express his feelings on canvas, leading him to aspire for a coveted spot at Tokyo's University of the Arts. But the path to artistic greatness is fraught with challenges, as Yatora faces fierce competition, a lack of experience, and the struggle to gain his parents' approval. Will his determination and newfound love for painting be enough to overcome these obstacles? Join Yatora as he navigates the complex and unforgiving world of art, where beauty and brutality coexist, and where his journey of self-discovery unfolds. The anime premiered on Netflix on September 25, 2021, with regular broadcast beginning on October 2, 2021, and international Netflix streaming commencing on October 9th, 2021.
